cards.name: Archangel Avacyn // Avacyn, the Purifier
cards.text:
Flash
Flying, vigilance
When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

rulings.text: Archangel Avacyn’s delayed triggered ability triggers at the beginning of the next upkeep regardless of whose turn it is.

Archangel Avacyn’s delayed triggered ability won’t cause it to transform back into Archangel Avacyn if it has already transformed into Avacyn, the Purifier, perhaps because several creatures died in one turn.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Erzengel Avacyn // Avacyn die Läuterin
foreignNames.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend, Wachsamkeit
Wenn Erzengel Avacyn ins Spiel kommt, erhalten Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, bis zum Ende des Zuges Unzerstörbarkeit.
Wenn eine Nicht-Engel-Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, transformiere Erzengel Avacyn zu Beginn des nächsten Versorgungssegments.

foreignNames.name: Arcángel Avacyn // Avacyn, la Purificadora
foreignNames.text:
Destello.
Vuela, vigilancia.
Cuando el Arcángel Avacyn entre al campo de batalla, las criaturas que controlas ganan la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno.
Cuando una criatura que controles que no sea Ángel muera, transforma al Arcángel Avacyn al principio del próximo mantenimiento.

foreignNames.name: Archange Avacyn // Avacyn, la purificatrice
foreignNames.text:
Flash
Vol, vigilance
Quand l'Archange Avacyn arrive sur le champ de bataille, les créatures que vous contrôlez acquièrent l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Quand une créature non-Ange que vous contrôlez meurt, transformez l'Archange Avacyn au début du prochain entretien.

foreignNames.name: Arcangelo Avacyn // Avacyn, la Purificatrice
foreignNames.text:
Lampo
Volare, cautela
Quando l'Arcangelo Avacyn entra nel campo di battaglia, le creature che controlli hanno indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno.
Quando una creatura non Angelo che controlli muore, trasforma l'Arcangelo Avacyn all'inizio del prossimo mantenimento.

foreignNames.name: 大天使アヴァシン // 浄化の天使、アヴァシン
foreignNames.text:
瞬速
飛行、警戒
大天使アヴァシンが戦場に出たとき、ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは破壊不能を得る。
あなたがコントロールする天使でないクリーチャーが１体死亡したとき、次のアップキープの開始時に、大天使アヴァシンを変身させる。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 天使

foreignNames.name: 대천사 아바신 // 정화자 아바신
foreignNames.text:
섬광
비행, 경계
대천사 아바신이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다.
당신이 조종하는 천사가 아닌 생물이 죽을 때, 다음 유지단 시작에 대천사 아바신을 변신시킨다.

foreignNames.name: Arcanjo Avacyn // Avacyn, a Purificadora
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo
Voar, vigilância
Quando Arcanjo Avacyn entra no campo de batalha, as criaturas que você controla ganham indestrutível até o final do turno.
Quando uma criatura que você controla que não seja um Anjo morrer, transforme Arcanjo Avacyn no início da próxima manutenção.

foreignNames.name: Архангел Авацина // Авацина, Очистительница
foreignNames.text:
Миг
Полет, Бдительность
Когда Архангел Авацина выходит на поле битвы, существа под вашим контролем получают Неразрушимость до конца хода.
Когда не являющееся Ангелом существо под вашим контролем умирает, трансформируйте Архангела Авацину в начале следующего шага поддержки.

foreignNames.name: 大天使艾维欣 // 净罪天使艾维欣
foreignNames.text:
闪现
飞行，警戒
当大天使艾维欣进战场时，由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。
当一个由你操控且非天使的生物死去，在下一个维持开始时，转化大天使艾维欣。

foreignNames.name: 大天使艾維欣 // 淨罪天使艾維欣
foreignNames.text:
閃現
飛行，警戒
當大天使艾維欣進戰場時，由你操控的生物獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。
當一個由你操控且非天使的生物死去，在下一個維持開始時，轉化大天使艾維欣。

cards.originalText:
Flash
Flying, vigilance
When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

cards.name: Archangel Avacyn // Avacyn, the Purifier
cards.text:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.
cards.flavor:
"Wings that once bore hope are now stained with blood. She is our guardian no longer."
—Grete, cathar apostate

rulings.text: Archangel Avacyn’s delayed triggered ability triggers at the beginning of the next upkeep regardless of whose turn it is.

Archangel Avacyn’s delayed triggered ability won’t cause it to transform back into Archangel Avacyn if it has already transformed into Avacyn, the Purifier, perhaps because several creatures died in one turn.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Erzengel Avacyn // Avacyn die Läuterin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn diese Kreatur in Avacyn die Läuterin transformiert, fügt sie jeder anderen Kreatur und jedem Gegner 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Schwingen, die einst Hoffnung verhießen, sind nun mit Blut besudelt. Sie ist nicht länger unser Schutzengel."
—Gretel, Katharer-Abtrünnige

foreignNames.name: Arcángel Avacyn // Avacyn, la Purificadora
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando esta criatura se transforme en Avacyn, la Purificadora, hace 3 puntos de daño a cada una de las demás criaturas y a cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Las alas que antes traían esperanza están ahora teñidas de sangre. Ella ya no es nuestra guardiana."
—Grete, cátara apóstata

foreignNames.name: Archange Avacyn // Avacyn, la purificatrice
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand cette créature se transforme en Avacyn, la purificatrice, elle inflige 3 blessures à chaque autre créature et chaque adversaire.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les ailes qui incarnaient autrefois l'espoir sont aujourd'hui maculées de sang. Ce n'est plus notre gardienne. »
—Grëte, apostate cathare

foreignNames.name: Arcangelo Avacyn // Avacyn, la Purificatrice
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando questa creatura si trasforma in Avacyn, la Purificatrice, infligge 3 danni a ogni altra creatura e a ogni avversario.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Le sue ali, un tempo portatrici di speranza, ora sono intrise di sangue. Non è più la nostra guardiana."
—Grete, catara apostata

foreignNames.name: 大天使アヴァシン // 浄化の天使、アヴァシン
foreignNames.text:
飛行
このクリーチャーが浄化の天使、アヴァシンに変身したとき、これは他の各クリーチャーと各対戦相手にそれぞれ３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー ― - 天使
foreignNames.flavor:
「かつて私たちの希望だった翼が、今は血にまみれています。あれはもう私たちの守護者ではありません。」
――背教聖戦士、グレーテ
foreignNames.faceName: 浄化の天使、アヴァシン

foreignNames.name: 대천사 아바신 // 정화자 아바신
foreignNames.text:
비행
이 생물이 정화자 아바신으로 변신할 때, 이 생물은 다른 각 생물과 각 상대에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"한 때 희망을 날랐던 날개가 이제는 피로 물들었다. 그녀는 더 이상 우리의 수호자가 아니다."
—변절한 성전사 그레테

foreignNames.name: Arcanjo Avacyn // Avacyn, a Purificadora
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando esta criatura se transforma em Avacyn, a Purificadora, ela causa 3 pontos de dano a cada outra criatura e a cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor:
"As mesmas asas que uma dia trouxeram esperança, agora estão manchadas de sangue. Ela não é mais nossa guardiã."
— Grete, apóstata cátara

foreignNames.name: Архангел Авацина // Авацина, Очистительница
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда это существо трансформируется в Авацину, Очистительницу, оно наносит по 3 повреждения каждому другому существу и каждому оппоненту.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Крылья, когда-то несшие надежду, запятнаны кровью. Больше она нам не защитница».
— Грета, отступница катаров

foreignNames.name: 大天使艾维欣 // 净罪天使艾维欣
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当此生物转化为净罪天使艾维欣时，它向每个其他生物和每位对手各造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「曾承载希望的双翼如今已沾满鲜血。她已不再是我们的守护天使了。」
～护教军叛教者葛俐

foreignNames.name: 大天使艾維欣 // 淨罪天使艾維欣
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當此生物轉化為淨罪天使艾維欣時，它向每個其他生物和每位對手各造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「曾承載希望的雙翼如今已沾滿鮮血。她已不再是我們的守護天使了。」
～護教軍叛教者葛俐

cards.originalText:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.
